title: Statement by the Press Secretary on Trilateral Meeting with President Park Geun-hye of the Republic of Korea and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 28, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on Trilateral Meeting with President Park Geun-hye of the Republic of Korea and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan





On March 31st , the President will host President Park Geun-hye of the Republic of Korea and Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan for a trilateral meeting on the margins of the Nuclear Security Summit.Â  This meeting will be an opportunity for the three leaders to discuss common responses to the threat posed by North Korea and to advance areas of trilateral security cooperation in the region and globally.
